title: Crypto-DesignService
author: Crypto-DesignService
content: Made a simple and easy-to-use portfolio tracker for you to track your coins. It can be used if you're a casual trader, investor, or a day trader. Currently supported 25 coins, but I can always update it anytime and add coins, especially if requested as long as the coins is available on coinmarketcap.com as that's where I'm pulling the current prices.Consists of:transaction history with graphs to observe the development of your coins on specific date that you choosedashboard with overall stats and graphs of all your transaction history.Portfolio Tracker coins added:Code:TetherBitcoinEthereumBinanceCardanoUSD CoinXRPBinance USDDogecoinPolygonSolanaPolkadotLitecoinAvalanceShiba InuTronDaiUniswapCosmosChainlinkMoneroStellarEthereum ClassicBitcoin CashVeChainThis is a pure function formula with no google script attached, so you don't need to worry about authorizing any script when making a copy. Please let me know if you have suggestions or encounter any errors. Thank you*If you need help with any google sheet task, please send me a message
